rows.label: tev000694_MSG0001
rows.name: Hey there, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000694_MSG0002
rows.name:
Care to join us? I was just having a drink with my new
Wrothian friend here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000694_MSG0003
rows.name:
He was telling me how tough it is to be the eldest son
in a Wrothian family. Lots of responsibility having to
inherit the family name and sword and all that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000694_MSG0004
rows.name:
I had it pretty tough, too. When I was born, it was
just me—but then one day, all outta the blue,
everyone said I had to start acting like a big brother.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000694_MSG0005
rows.name:
Worse still, my little brother was better than me at
just about everything. That's how I got all bitter and
ended up the way I am today.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000694_MSG0006
rows.name:
So how about it? If you were in our situation,
which brother would you rather be? Older or younger?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000694_JNK0010
rows.name: Older

rows.label: tev000694_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that you'd rather be an older brother.

rows.label: tev000694_JNK0020
rows.name: Younger

rows.label: tev000694_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that you'd rather be a younger brother.

rows.label: tev000694_JNK0030
rows.name: Neither

rows.label: tev000694_SEL0031
rows.name: Say that you'd rather be an only child.

rows.label: tev000694_MSG0007
rows.name:
Glutton for punishment, huh?
Just like me and my Wrothian friend here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000694_MSG0008
rows.name:
Of course, I bet younger brothers complain they got it
worse. But you just gotta review the history to see
who's actually right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000694_MSG0009
rows.name: Let's compare grades back in school, for instance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000694_MSG0010
rows.name: I averaged about a B-minus. Er, give or take.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000694_MSG0011
rows.name:
Then Phog came along and started getting A-pluses
across the board! You wouldn't believe the praise they
lavished on him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000694_MSG0012
rows.name:
"Look how much smarter he is than Frye!" Pffft.
Buncha crap, but people just couldn't get over it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000694_MSG0013
rows.name:
You ask me, it's not really fair to compare old report
cards if you don't pay attention to how a person has
grown since, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000694_MSG0014
rows.name:
And what was I supposed to do with that? Argue?
I'd look like an even bigger fool![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000694_MSG0015
rows.name: So I just bottled up all that resentment instead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000694_MSG0016
rows.name:
Looking back on it, I probably should've tried to stay
ahead of Phog.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000694_MSG0017
rows.name: But that never really occurred to me at the time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000694_MSG0018
rows.name: Course, that's all water under the bridge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000694_MSG0019
rows.name: Phog is Phog and Frye is me, ya know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000694_MSG0020
rows.name: And I don't see him being better than me. No way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000694_MSG0021
rows.name: Taking the easy way out, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000694_MSG0022
rows.name:
But you know what? I bet you'd actually have made
a pretty awesome little brother.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000694_MSG0023
rows.name:
Phog was always an indoor kind of kid.
We barely ever played together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000694_MSG0024
rows.name:
He was kinda sickly, too. He'd get heatstroke if we
ever played in direct sun for more than 10 minutes.
Plus migraines. And don't get me going on allergies![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000694_MSG0025
rows.name:
But you and me? We'd have gone hunting and
kayaking and played stickball together and all that.
We would have had a ton of fun![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000694_MSG0026
rows.name:
Luckily for Phog, he's got a mimeosome now,
so I guess he ain't sickly anymore. Huh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000694_MSG0027
rows.name:
Maybe once things have settled down a bit,
me and him can go fishing together or something.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000694_MSG0028
rows.name: Aw, come on! You don't mean that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000694_MSG0029
rows.name:
You don't remember stuff from before you got here,
right? So you've probably forgotten your family.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000694_MSG0030
rows.name:
Well trust me—even when you hate him,
it's good to have a brother.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000694_MSG0031
rows.name:
Even after being dumped on this weird planet,
I still feel a kind of bond that can never be broken.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000694_MSG0032
rows.name:
Having family just feels different from having friends.
It's weird. I can't explain it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000694_MSG0033
rows.name:
You should give it a shot. Even if you don't have
siblings, you can still piece together a family from
folks you meet, you know?[ST:wait ]
